Item.description: An item contains contextual information relevant to a resource (or a range within a resource).

url.description: An external URL with more information.

ui.description: The human user interface of the item, with information for human consumption.

ai.description: Information from the item intended for consumption by AI, not humans.

UserInterface.description: The human user interface of an item, with information for human consumption.

hover.title: Hover
hover.description: Additional information for the human, shown in a tooltip-like widget when they interact with the item.

markdown.description: The contents of the hover as Markdown, preferred over the text when rendered Markdown or HTML can be displayed.

text.description: The contents of the hover as plain text, used when rendered Markdown or HTML can't be displayed.

AssistantInfo.description: Information from an item intended for consumption by AI, not humans.

content.description: Text content for AI to consume.

Annotation.description: An annotation attaches an Item to a range in a document.

range.description: The range in the resource that this item applies to. If not set, the item applies to the entire resource.

presentationHints.description: Hints about the best way to present this annotation. Different clients interpret hints differently because they have different user interfaces.

items.title: PresentationHint
items.description:
A hint about how to best present an annotation to the human in the client's user interface.

- `prefer-link-over-detail`: Prefer to show the item as a link over showing the detail text, if the client does not cleanly support doing both.
